highlights: Developed a responsive portfolio using ReactJS , Tailwind CSS and Netlify to host portfolio and go global in minutes.
Deployed on Netlify, ensuring 99.9% uptime and scalable global access with reduced load times for enhanced performance.
Utilized Git for version control to efficiently manage codebase and track development changes.
Built a fully responsive URL shortener with real-time link generation and sharing.
Optimized backend for high-performance redirection with scalable Node.js architecture.
Deployed frontend on Netlify and backend on Render, achieving 99.9% uptime and fast global access.
Managed version control and collaboration using Git, ensuring clean code and efficient development.

tech: ReactJS, MongoDB Atlas, Express JS, React-fiber
highlights: Collaborating with the client, Reva to develop a scalable and user-centric web application tailored to business requirements.
Implementing robust frontend features using ReactJS for a seamless and interactive user experience.
Developing and optimizing RESTful APIs to enable efficient communication between frontend and backend services.
Managing version control and continuous code improvement using Git.
Conducting functional testing to ensure smooth delivery and identify critical bugs prior to deployment.
